data.message: Hi Facebook, how can I get acccess to change my name on Facebook?

replies.message: Hi Tabea. Learn how to change your name here: http://bit.ly/2bxOjMy. -Colleen
Can I chat with one of you to explain my situation?
This is a great place to ask a question, Tabea. How can we help? -Colleen

My problem is that last year someone reported my name twice and I had to use av legimention. And now I'm changing it for real, getting answer in a couple of weeks, and cannot change it on Facebook and I really wanna continue being on this Facebook since I've all my friends on it :/
Hi there. You may be asked to upload documents to confirm your name.  Learn how you can confirm your identity here: http://bit.ly/2bxRpjy. -Colleen
Does an papir with the accepted name be enough?

Hi there. Documentation must include your accepted name and date of birth or accepted name and photo. If the documentation is not government-issued you must submit two different forms of ID. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2bxTdsD. -Colleen
I got my name accepted and I sent it to you! Please check it out ask sooon ask possible.
Please answer fast! I wanna change my name so I wont get reported to have a false name!!!!
